prod_desc: Watch budding builders take flight with this colorful parrot!
prod_long_desc:
Your toddler will love flying this cute LEGO® DUPLO® parrot all around the room! It’s easy to build, developing early construction and fine motor skills as they go. Fire their imagination and combine the bricks in different ways to make all sorts of colorful birds. DUPLO bricks are specially designed to be safe for little hands.
Features a buildable bird.
Help your child master basic building skills with this simple model.
Inspire imagination and story-telling as toddlers take this cute bird on all sorts of flying adventures.
Rebuild this set into a different colorful bird every time.
LEGO® DUPLO® products are specially designed to be fun and easy for little hands.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 1½-3 years.
Bird measures over 3” high, 4” long and 4” wide.
